jobDescription: Are you a Data Analyst looking for a new role?  Robert Half is seeking an experienced Data Analyst to work with a large national fortune 500 company on a long-term contract.  Location: Currently in Lower Queen Anne, but moving to Bothell the 2nd week of September  Parking / Transportation information: not available in Seattle, but free in Bothell  Contract type: Temporary, but open to temporary-to-hire  Start Date: week of July 9  Duration: ongoing  Pay: $26+ DOE  Work Schedule: 8am 5pm (flexible start time between 7am and 9am) 9 hour shift with 1 hour lunch, Monday - Friday Job Description: We are on the search for a Database administrator with experience working in ADP. The ideal candidate will have previous work experience working with compensation/HRIS or database analyst work. This role will require highly advanced ADP skills, including higher functions, not just payroll processing.  · Maintain data  · Pull and upload data (no analytical reporting)  Will work within ADP to make changes in pay rates
